story.title: Built with Purpose.
story.p1: Hi. My name is Sarin Dararith, I'm a self-taught developer. Khnhom began as a personal challenge, a desire to solve a simple but persistent problem I saw around me.
story.p2: In Cambodia, we have a unique digital landscape. I wanted to build something that didn't just copy existing platforms, but respected our local context. Our online presence is growing exponentially, but many of us still manually share our socials presence in a scatter way. Many of us still go to our banking app each time we need to share our QR code.
story.p3: Khnhom is more than just a link-in-bio tool. It's a commitment to building better digital infrastructure for our community.
